mystring = "the quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog"

mylist  = mystring.split()

mylist

['the', 'quick', 'brown', 'fox', 'jumped', 'over', 'the', 'lazy', 'dog']
newstring = "|".join(mylist)

newstring

'the|quick|brown|fox|jumped|over|the|lazy|dog'
newstring.split()

['the|quick|brown|fox|jumped|over|the|lazy|dog']
newlist = newstring.split("|")

print(newlist[1])

quick

[
    'the',
    "quick"
]

['the', 'quick']
